subject: p11474065
Findings: The patient is status post right thoracotomy. Moderate layering right pleural effusion is present as well as right basilar atelectasis. Left lung is grossly clear, but there is an apparent small left pleural effusion. Subcutaneous emphysema is present in the right chest wall consistent with recent surgery.
